description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人。曾任国务院副总理、国家计划委员会主任、中共中央政治局常委等职。是中国社会主义经济建设的奠基人之一，在文化大革命期间因二月逆流事件受到迫害。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China politician, a former national-level leader. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Director of the State Planning Commission, and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP Central Committee. He was one of the founders of China's socialist economic construction and was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution for his involvement in the February Countercurrent.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，女权主义活动家，李富春的妻子。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, a feminist activist, and the wife of Li Fuchun.

description.zh-cn: 李富春和蔡畅的独生女。
description.en: The only daughter of Li Fuchun and Cai Chang.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席，在李富春担任中共中央政治局常委期间为其直接上级。
description.en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, he was the direct superior of Li Fuchun during the latter's tenure as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理，在李富春担任副总理期间为其直接上级。李富春在文革期间曾协助其主管经济工作。
description.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, he was the direct superior of Li Fuchun during the latter's tenure as Vice Premier. Li Fuchun assisted him in managing economic work during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一。曾是李富春与蔡畅婚礼的证婚人，并在李富春的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: A paramount leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He was the witness at the wedding of Li Fuchun and Cai Chang, and delivered the eulogy at Li Fuchun's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，其在长征期间的南下路线遭到李富春的反对。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party whose southern route during the Long March was opposed by Li Fuchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替李富春担任中华人民共和国国家计划委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Li Fuchun as the Director of the State Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾与李富春共同将勤工俭学励进会改名为工学世界社。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party who, along with Li Fuchun, renamed the Diligent Work-Frugal Study Encouragement Society to the Work-Study World Society.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，原红三军团军团长，曾于1938年在延安与李富春等人合影。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China and former commander of the 3rd Army Group of the Red Army, who was photographed with Li Fuchun and others in Yan'an in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一。曾于1938年在延安与李富春等人合影，后接替其担任中共中央书记处办公厅主任。
description.en: A paramount leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He was photographed with Li Fuchun and others in Yan'an in 1938 and later succeeded him as Director of the General Office of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾于1938年在延安与李富春等人合影。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who was photographed with Li Fuchun and others in Yan'an in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与李富春等人一同在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与李富春等人一同在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，与李富春等人一同在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party who, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，与李富春等人一同在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A paramount leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China who, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与李富春等人一同在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与李富春等人一同在“二月逆流”事件中对文化大革命进行抗争。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who, along with Li Fuchun and others, resisted the Cultural Revolution in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南长沙的一所中学，李富春的母校之一。
description.en: A secondary school in Changsha, Hunan, and one of Li Fuchun's alma maters.

zh-cn: 莫斯科东方劳动者共产主义大学
en: Communist University of the Toilers of the East

description.zh-cn: 苏联为殖民地和附属国培养干部的学校，李富春于1925年在此学习。
description.en: A Soviet school for training cadres from colonial and dependent countries, where Li Fuchun studied in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党旅欧支部的早期组织，李富春曾参与建立并担任地方支部书记。
description.en: An early organization of the European branch of the Chinese Communist Party, which Li Fuchun helped establish and served as a local branch secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，李富春长期在此担任重要领导职务。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, where Li Fuchun held important leadership positions for a long time.

zh-cn: 旅欧中国共产主义青年团

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织，李富春曾担任其旅欧执行委员会委员长等职。
description.en: The youth wing of the Chinese Communist Party, where Li Fuchun served as chairman of its European Executive Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政党，李富春在第一次国共合作时期曾加入并担任旅欧支部职务。
description.en: A Chinese political party that Li Fuchun joined during the First United Front, serving in its European branch.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的部队之一，李富春曾在其中担任副党代表兼政治部主任。
description.en: One of the units of the National Revolutionary Army, where Li Fuchun served as Deputy Party Representative and Director of the Political Department.

zh-cn: 中国共产党江西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省的领导机关，李富春曾任代理书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Jiangxi Province, where Li Fuchun served as acting secretary.

zh-cn: 中国工农红军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的最高政治工作机关，李富春曾任代主任。
description.en: The highest political work organ of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, where Li Fuchun served as acting director.

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第三军团

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，李富春曾任其政治委员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, where Li Fuchun served as its political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党组织和干部工作的职能部门，李富春在抗日战争时期曾任副部长。
description.en: The functional department responsible for the CCP's organizational and cadre work, where Li Fuchun served as deputy head during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构，李富春曾任其主任。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, where Li Fuchun once served as its director.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西满地区的领导机构，李富春曾任其书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in the West Manchuria region, where Li Fuchun served as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在东北地区的领导机构，李富春曾任其副书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Northeast China, where Li Fuchun served as its deputy secretary.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军在东北地区设立的军事组织，李富春曾任其副政委。
description.en: A military organization established by the People's Liberation Army in Northeast China during the Second Chinese Civil War, where Li Fuchun served as its deputy political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 1949年设立的东北地区最高行政机关，李富春曾任其副主席。
description.en: The highest administrative body in Northeast China established in 1949, where Li Fuchun served as its vice chairman.

zh-cn: 政务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的经济领导机构，李富春曾任其副主任。
description.en: The economic leadership body in the early days of the People's Republic of China, where Li Fuchun served as its vice director.

zh-cn: 中央人民政府重工业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的工业主管部门，李富春曾任其部长。
description.en: The industrial administration department in the early days of the People's Republic of China, where Li Fuchun served as its minister.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责宏观经济调控和计划的部门，李富春曾长期担任其主任。
description.en: The department of the People's Republic of China responsible for macroeconomic regulation and planning, where Li Fuchun served as its director for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，李富春曾任其副总理。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, where Li Fuchun served as its Vice Premier.

description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party, where Li Fuchun served as a member.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构，李富春曾任其书记。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, where Li Fuchun served as a secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构，李富春曾任其委员。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party, where Li Fuchun served as a member.

description.zh-cn: 1926年至1928年间由中国国民党领导、以国民革命军为主力的统一中国的战争，李富春曾参与其中。
description.en: A military campaign led by the Kuomintang from 1926 to 1928 to unify China, in which Li Fuchun participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的战略性大转移，李富春参与了此次行动。
description.en: The strategic retreat of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, in which Li Fuchun participated.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中国共产党在根据地内展开的生产自救运动，李富春是组织者之一。
description.en: A self-help production campaign launched by the Chinese Communist Party in its base areas during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which Li Fuchun helped organize.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一个国民经济发展计划，李富春参与了其制订工作。
description.en: The first national economic development plan of the People's Republic of China, in whose formulation Li Fuchun participated.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场政治运动，期间李富春因“二月逆流”事件受到严重迫害。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Li Fuchun was severely persecuted for his involvement in the 'February Countercurrent' incident.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1959至1961年间的全国性饥荒事件。此后，李富春提出了“八字方针”以调整国民经济。
description.en: A nationwide famine that occurred between 1959 and 1961. Afterwards, Li Fuchun proposed the 'Eight-Character Policy' to adjust the national economy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在长征途中召开的一次重要会议，李富春参与了此次会议。
description.en: An important conference held by the Chinese Communist Party during the Long March, which Li Fuchun attended.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期，一批中共元老对文革的错误做法进行抗争的事件，李富春是主要参与者之一。
description.en: An event in the early stage of the Cultural Revolution where a group of CCP veterans resisted the erroneous practices of the movement; Li Fuchun was one of the main participants.

description.zh-cn: 1961年由李富春提出的用于调整国民经济的方针，内容是“调整、巩固、充实、提高”。
description.en: A policy proposed by Li Fuchun in 1961 to adjust the national economy, with the content of 'readjustment, consolidation, reinforcement, and improvement'.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南省的历史行政区划，李富春的出生地。
description.en: A historical administrative division in Hunan Province, the birthplace of Li Fuchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，李富春的逝世地点。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Li Fuchun's death.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任中共中央主席期间，李富春任政治局常委。
description.en: While Mao Zedong was Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Li Fuchun served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任国务院总理期间，李富春任副总理。
description.en: While Zhou Enlai was Premier of the State Council, Li Fuchun served as Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 以国民革命军第二军副党代表兼政治部主任身份参与北伐战争。
description.en: Participated in the Northern Expedition as the Deputy Party Representative and Director of the Political Department of the National Revolutionary Army's Second Army.

description.zh-cn: 参与长征。
description.en: Participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 参与遵义会议。
description.en: Participated in the Zunyi Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在长征期间，反对张国焘的南下路线。
description.en: During the Long March, he opposed Zhang Guotao's southern route.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织大生产运动，并直接领导陕甘宁边区财经工作。
description.en: Participated in organizing the Great Production Campaign and directly led the financial and economic work of the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家计委主任，组织编制国民经济发展计划，参与一五计划的制订。
description.en: As Director of the State Planning Commission, he organized the formulation of national economic development plans and participated in the creation of the First Five-Year Plan.

description.zh-cn: 三年大饥荒后，李富春提出了“调整、巩固、充实、提高”的“八字方针”以调整国民经济。
description.en: After the Great Chinese Famine, Li Fuchun proposed the 'Eight-Character Policy' of 'readjustment, consolidation, reinforcement, and improvement' to adjust the national economy.

description.zh-cn: 提出了“调整、巩固、充实、提高”的“八字方针”。
description.en: Proposed the 'Eight-Character Policy' of 'readjustment, consolidation, reinforcement, and improvement'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，李富春因参与“二月逆流”而被诬为“黑俱乐部主任”，受到严重迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Li Fuchun was falsely accused of being the 'director of the black club' and severely persecuted for his involvement in the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 与陈毅、叶剑英等人对文化大革命的错误做法进行抗争，被称为“二月逆流”。
description.en: Along with Chen Yi, Ye Jianying, and others, he resisted the erroneous practices of the Cultural Revolution, an event known as the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 为李富春与蔡畅的婚礼担任证婚人。
description.en: Served as the witness at the wedding of Li Fuchun and Cai Chang.

description.zh-cn: 在李富春的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: Delivered the eulogy at Li Fuchun's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里接替李富春担任中华人民共和国国家计划委员会主任。
description.en: Yu Qiuli succeeded Li Fuchun as Director of the State Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆接替李富春担任中共中央书记处办公厅主任。
description.en: Yang Shangkun succeeded Li Fuchun as Director of the General Office of the Central Secretariat of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，原红三军团军团长彭德怀和三任政治委员李富春、杨尚昆、滕代远于延安合影。
description.en: In 1938, Peng Dehuai, former commander of the 3rd Army Group of the Red Army, and its three political commissars, Li Fuchun, Yang Shangkun, and Teng Daiyuan, were photographed together in Yan'an.
